full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=================================

 Contract Title: W0103-249497 - High Frequency (HF) Radio Packages

Contract Reference Number: WS4125869169-Doc4150301254

**Important Dates:**

*   Tender Closing Date: Wednesday, October 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
*   Amendment Date: Friday, September 29, 2023
*   Publication Date: Monday, August 28, 2023

**Contract Information:**

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting offers for the supply, delivery, and accessory installation of High Frequency Radio Packages. The bid should include HF Portable Radio, HF radio base station, external and/or internal modems for data transmission, EMAIL AND TEXT MESSAGE INTERFACE(S), and a comprehensive warranty and replacement parts.

**Tender Requirements:**

*   The bidder must meet the evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation document.
*   The successful bidder will be awarded the contract based on the lowest price.
*   The contract is subject to the option for additional goods and/or services.

**Contact Information:**

*   Christine Cress, Contract Administration Specialist
*   Email: christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: Not Available
*   Fax: Not Available
*   URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17286514?extsite=MTcyODY1MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

# **Tender Status**
This tender has expired. 
======================================
